Muslims plant a bomb in a Thai restaurant, killing the owner and injuring sixty others.
A civilian is gunned down by Muslim militants.
Three civilians are killed as a dedicated Muslim blows himself to Allah.  Nine others injured.
Eight people are killed by a suicide bomber, with another 25 injured, some critically.
Jihadists attack a police checkpoint with machine-guns, killing eight.
The bodies of three civilians and one soldier are found in a field, brutally slain, with handwriting declaring them to be traitors to the cause of Allah.
Sunni takes two members of a Shia political party with him to 'paradise.'  Car bombing injures nine others as well.
17-year-old Israeli girl dies trying to protect her 10-year-old brother from a Hamas rocket attack (on 1-15).
At least three killed as militant Muslims go on a wild shooting and arson spree.
Palestinian suicide bomber murders a father of three and injures seven others.
Salafists slit the throat of a motorist stopped at a phony roadblock.
The Islamic government bombs a village in Darfur, killing more than a hundred people, mostly women and children.  An unknown number are wounded.
Pakistani fuel truck driver and two assistants are murdered by the Taliban in a senseless attack.
Three al-Qaeda suicide bombings leave more than two dozen dead and scores of civilians badly injured.  One of the targets was the Australian embassy.
Three people are killed by Islamic fundamentalists in a cemetery.  Five others are injured.
Suicide bomber drives an ambulance full of explosives into a Shia wedding party, slaughtering a dozen, including women and children and injuring dozens more including the bride and groom.
Radical Sunnis car bomb a Shia mosque as the victims celebrate a religious holiday.  Fourteen are killed, and about forty injured.
The Mujahideen kidnap three civilians and torture two of them, eventually killing one.
Two truck drivers are kidnapped and beheaded on a public street as executioners chant 'Allah Akbar.'
Four people, including a police chief and two relatives, are killed by a Taliban roadside bomb.
Islamic fundamentalists attack a security patrol killing two police and injuring one civilian.
Janjaweed militia attack several villages, burning houses and killing a dozen innocents.
Muslim gunmen kill a policeman.
A government worker is murdered by Islamists.
The Mujahideen gun down an orchard worker (Shopian) and toss a grenade into a bus stop.

A civilian is brutally tortured to death by MILF terrorists.

Muslims kill a civilian in front of his home.

MILF terrorists attack a security patrol, killing four members.

A 23-year-old woman is killed by her youngest brother at a bus stop because she 'dishonored' the family by refusing to marry her cousin.

al-Qaeda militants ambush four journalists riding in a car.  Two are murdered.

Shiite radicals gun down an Iraqi journalist and his 3-year-old son in front of their home.

A policeman is gunned down by Islamists.
An Iraqi translator and his son are gunned down by Islamists near their home.
A powerful Hezbollah suicide bomb blast kills the former Lebanese Prime Minister and fourteen others.  One-hundred and twenty are injured in the blast.

Muslim separatists shoot a 48-year-old man off of a motorcycle, injuring his wife as well.
Twenty-five people are injured when the Mujahideen toss a grenade into a crowded street.
An bomb outside a shopping mall kills five shoppers and injures at least three dozen others.  Abu Sayyaf claims responsibility.
The Abu Sayyaf terrorist group detonates a bomb in the Philippine capital outside a crowded bus terminal, setting three buses on fire and killing at least three.
Muslims shoot two people, including a teenage girl, to death in an attack on a karaoke club.
Sectarian shooting attack leaves three dead Sunnis and fourteen others injured.

Mujahideen toss a grenade into a bus stop, killing one and injuring seven.  Elsewhere (Rajouri) they kidnap and kill a 60-year-old man.

Bombing kills two and injures five near a hotel.
Three truck drivers are murdered by Islamic terrorists.

Suicide bomber kills fifteen Shia worshippers inside a mosque just as Friday prayers are beginning.  Another two dozen are injured.
Islamists bomb a Christian-owned gas station, killing two people.

Militants gun down a civilian outside a hospital.
A school headmaster is murdered by Islamists.
A village head is murdered by Islamists.
Nine Russian servicemen are killed in an attack by the Mujahideen in the capital's suburbs.

Suicide bomber rams his car into a police convoy, killing four and injuring about thirty.
Jihad car bombing kills two Iraqis and leaves fourteen others injured.

The Mujahideen kill five people and injure at least two others in a suicide assault on a government building in the region's capital.
Militant Islamist hurls a grenade into a crowd of people, injuring at least ten civilians.
Islamic suicide bomber drives an explosive-packed vehicle into a police compound, killing fifteen and leaving another two dozen in various stages of agony.
Muslim terrorists kill seven people over a two day stretch that includes a Buddhist grocery store owner and a village chief.

A man is gunned down as he is walking to a local market.
Two people in a small Algerian town are killed when religious fundamentalists set off a bomb.
Car bomber kills eight people and Jihad gunmen kill another four in a separate incident, also in Mosul.
The Mujahideen kidnap a 17-year-old boy from his home and then kill him.
A Fedayeen suicide car bomber blows his way to paradise by driving into a crowd of unemployed Iraqis, taking the lives of more than one-hundred souls, most of whom were Christian.
Arab militias with the support of the Islamic government attack a village and kill seventeen civilians and injure a dozen others including several women who were raped.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen terrorists capture, disarm and then execute two Indian soldiers.

A government official is killed in a shooting attack by militant Muslims.
Muslim terrorists murder three civilians in separate random shooting attacks.
One policeman is killed, and sixteen others injured when the Mujahideen attack their station.
Two suicide car bombings kills thirteen Iraqis and wound thirty.  In a separate attack, a judge and his son are gunned down.
Militant Muslims injure ten people with a bomb outside a shrine.
Islamic terrorists fire on a pickup carrying four people, killing one.
A man is shot off of his motorcycle by Muslim militants.
Five people are killed by two Fedayeen suicide bombers outside a government building.

al-Qaeda suicide bomber accounts for most of the fifteen people dead in four attacks.  At least twenty-six others are injured.
British national gunned down by a Taliban terrorist while waiting at a traffic light.
Two Israelis are wounded by a Palestinian sniper.
Three people, including two Buddhists and a businesswoman are murdered in three separate attacks by Muslim terrorists.
Christian pastor attacked and beheaded by Muslim extremists as he is returning home from work.

Islamic extremists set up a fake roadblock, then machine-gun two policemen to death in their vehicle.

Three car bombings kill a total of four civilians, including two farmers.
The Mujahideen ambush a search party, killing at least one person.  They also kill a civilian at his home (Gagrot Piri).

Suicide bomber successfully kills a young child and injures four others.
Jihad car bombing kills four civilians and injures seven.
A policeman is killed and three other people injured when Muslim separatists set off a bomb at a railway station.
al-Qaeda suicide bomber kills three soldiers and injures eight other people, including civilians.
A school principal is gunned down by Islamic radicals.

The Taliban detonate a roadside bomb targeting a humanitarian convoy that kills two women, two men and one Afghan child.  Thirty-two others are injured.

The Mujahideen kill an 8-year-old boy by tossing a grenade into a school.  Six of his classmates sustain critical injuries.

Three separate shooting attacks by Islamic militants leave at least two villagers dead, including a Buddhist man shot in the back of the head while sitting in his tea shop.

Radical Sunni suicide bomber blows up a Shia religious festival near a Pakistani shrine, killing about three dozen and injuring many more.
A suicide bomber walks into a government building and kills three others.  Jihadists then open fire on the subsequent funeral, killing two others.
One civilian is killed, and thirteen other people injured by two bombs placed by Islamic separatists, one near a river pavilion.
Islamic separatists open fire on a restaurant, killing one customer and injuring three others.
A roadside bombing rips through the bodies of four women and three children riding in a vehicle.
Three people, including two women, are murdered in a Jihad car bombing.
Roadside blast kills four civilians.  Elsewhere (in Kut), the bodies of six captured soldiers are found bound and executed.
A guard is killed by Islamic militants.
Two government employees are shot to death by the Taliban.

A rubber plantation owner has his life cut short by Islamic radicals.

Muslim terrorists abduct a civilian then slit his throat a day later.
Bomb in a predominately Christian suburb injures five.
Four policemen are killed, and six wounded, in an attack on their station by radical Sunni.
Sixteen people are injured and one killed when the Mujahideen lob a grenade near a crowded bus stop.

Religious fanatic blows himself up, also killing two U.S. soldiers.
Bombing and shooting attack on a train by Muslim separatists results in more than a dozen casualties.

Four Islamic militants open fire on an church Easter service, killing at least one Christian and injuring six other worshippers.

Suicide bicycle bomber pedals his way to Paradise, taking five other souls with him including three civilians.

Fedayeen suicide bomber murders five civilians on a city street.
A suicide car bomber manages to kill five Iraqis and injure eight.  Most of the victims were children.

Suicide bomber takes four Iraqi with him.  Six others are badly injured.

al-Qaeda sets off two car bombs on a crowded city street, massacring eighteen people and injuring about forty others.

A civilian is kidnapped and murdered by the Taliban.

Two people, including a health care worker, are murdered by Islamists in separate attacks.

Two people are killed by a bomb set in a commercial district of a Christian town.
A 12-year-old girl is killed by a bomb that also injures her father and sister.

A grisly scene as a suicidal Sunni rams his car into two police vehicles, burning the occupants to death.
The Mujahideen open fire on civilians exiting a mosque, killing three and injuring an unknown number.
A health care worker is murdered by Islamists.
Two people are killed when Muslim extremists bomb a police station.
A postal worker is murdered by Islamists.

A suicide car bomber swerves his vehicle into a crowd of people on a sidewalk.  At least Twenty-seven are killed in the explosion.

Three police officers are killed in a bombing by Sunni extremists.
Radical Muslims gun down a cop in front of his home.
A civilian is shot and killed by Islamic terrorists.
The Mujahideen target a school with grenades, killing two women and injuring about fifty others, including eleven children.

Fedayeen suicide bomber plows into a troop transport, killing two Iraqi soldiers and one civilian.
A government teacher is dragged out of a high school class and shot to death on the sidewalk by the Mujahideen.
Islamists kill two policemen in an ambush.  Three others are injured.
Car bomb kills five Iraqis.
Civilians are victimized by another suicidal car bomber looking for a ticket to paradise.
The Mujahideen murder a father and his three sons as they are returning from their work in a coal mine.
Three beheaded corpses are found with signs of torture.

The bodies of thirty-four people, some in handcuffs, are found dumped in three locations.  Jihadis tortured and beheaded many of them.

A gruesome scene as an attack on a humanitarian project leaves five people dead.

In a brutal attack, Sunni gunmen kill a policeman and his elderly father as they are riding in a car.

Two civilians are killed by a suicide bomber.  Three others are injured.
Gemaat Sharia assassinate a government official with a powerful bomb that also kills his driver and injures two children playing nearby.
Two municipal workers are murdered by Islamists.
Sunni radicals spray a car with automatic weapons fire, killing a top official and his driver.
In a series of overnight attacks, the Mujahideen hang a woman and shoot two other innocents to death.
Two suicidal religious extremists murder more than thirty people outside the house of a community leader with twin bombings.
A suicidal Sunni tries to drive his explosives-packed car into a mosque.  Seven are killed and more than thirty hurt.  Five killed are family members.
Muslim extremists detonate a car bomb outside a Shiite restaurant, killing seven and injuring more then eighty.  Many have serious injuries.
Car bombing outside a girl's school kills six and injures eight.
A woman, her two sons and three daughters, are killed by a bomb planted in their home.
Muslim terrorists fire on a group of firefighters and police officers, killing one person.
A cop is gunned down by Jihadis.
Three civilians are killed when suspected Muslim terrorists throw two hand grenades into a village.
Jihadis attack and kill a university professor, along with three of his bodyguards.  They also knife a Shiite to death elsewhere.
Suicidal extremist kills three Iraqis and injures six with bombs hidden in a taxi.
Nigerian Sunnis attack a Shia political office, killing one and injuring fourteen.
Abu Sayyaf militants trigger a landmine against a vehicle on a water run, killing two soldiers and inuring three others.
A suicide bomber blows himself up amid a crowd of mostly Shia worshippers at a Pakistani shrine.  At least nineteen are killed and dozens injured.
Two civilians are killed and at least two dozen others injured, some badly, in a terrorist bombing.
Thai Muslims kill two men in separate attacks.
Muslims gun down a man in front of his wife and children.
Salafist Group for Preaching and Combat kill a security patrol member with a bomb.
Islamic fundamentalists murder a shepherd, then burn his body.
Two religious extremists kill five other people and injure at least forty more in coordinated suicide bombings.
A priest and an infant are among the nearly two dozen Christians killed when Islamic militants detonate two bombs in the center of a village.  At least sixty others are injured.
Islamists stab a 44-year-old Japanese hostage to death on videotape.
The Taliban stage a bold assassination on an opposition cleric, as he is leaving his office.
al-Qaeda suspected in ambush on Pakistani official's car that leaves three dead.
A suicide car bomber kills two Iraqis and injures eight on his way to Paradise.
Jihadis kill two civilians with a car bomb outside a school.  Nine others are injured.
Eight civilians, including children, are blown to bits by Islamic terrorists.
Forty-four people are injured in twins blasts set by Hizb-ul-Mujahideen.  One went off near a post office.
Four officers are killed in an assault on their station by religious extremists.
A Buddhist teacher is murdered by Islamic radicals.
Two Fedayeen suicide bombers kill twenty-seven Iraqis.  The first waded into a crowd before detonating.  The second ran after the survivors, killing many of them as well.
A mob of angry Shias take out their frustration at Sunnis on Kentucky Fried Chicken employees, killing six, including four who were burned alive.
A suicide bombing attack at a Shia mosque kills five people and injures twenty-six.
The Salafist Group for Preaching and Combat ambushes a security patrol, killing two and injuring five.
A civilian is blown apart in his car by a Jihad landmine.
A man is killed in his motorcycle shop by Muslim radicals.
A trader is murdered by Islamists.
A government official is murdered by Islamists.
A man is murdered by Muslims while inspecting a school.
An al-Qaeda member wades into a crowd of mourners at a funeral for a murdered anti-Taliban cleric, killing about two dozen people and hurting dozens more.
The Taliban kill two mine-detection crewmen in a remote-controlled blast.
Muslim militants fire into a crowded market from three passing cars, murdering at least nine civilians.
Jihadis detonate bombs on two motorcycles parked outside a cafe, killing five Iraqis.
Car bombing in a Christian area of the city takes the life of a journalist who opposed Syrian hegemony.
Four Iraqis killed in a blast by a suicidal Sunni.
A convoy of civilian contractors is targeted by a Fedayeen suicide bomber who paves his way to Paradise with at least four dead bodies.
Suicidal religious extremist plows his car into a restaurant and detonates a blast that leaves at least twelve people dead, including children, and forty others maimed.
The Mujahideen abduct and later behead four members of two families.
Thinking that they were a Christian family, Jihad gunmen spray the inside of a car with weapons fire, killing two parents and their three young children.
A teacher is murdered by Islamic radicals.
The Taliban invade the home of a civic educator, beat up his elderly father, then execute him.
Five separate attacks by the Taliban, leave five people dead and at least five others injured.
Ten Iraqis are slaughtered by a suicidal religious fanatic in a car bombing.  Twelve more are injured.
al-Qaeda militants attack and kill fifteen Mauritanian soldiers in a remote area.  Nineteen others are injured.
Islamic fundamentalists assassinate a deputy mayor.
A man is murdered by Muslim radicals while leaving his tea shop.
A man and his brother are shot to death in their shop by Muslim terrorists.
The Mujahideen abduct and kill two civilians.
An Iraqi soldier is killed by a suicide bomber on a motorcycle.
A 59-year-old Buddhist plantation worker is captured and beheaded by militant Muslims.
A teacher is murdered by fundamentalists.
A civilian is abducted from his home and beheaded by the Mujahideen.
Islamic Jihad bomb an Israeli greenhouse, killing three, including a Chinese worker.
Militants fighting for an Islamic state kill thirteen soldiers in a bombing attack on their truck.
Two Pakistani truck drivers are murdered by the Taliban.
Militant Sunnis kill eighteen Iraqi civilians in a series of four suicide bombings and other attacks.
The 'Army of Ansar al-Sunna' ambushes a civilian truck convoy and slaughters seven drivers.
A Buddhist teenager is shot in the head by Muslim separatists.
The bodies of seventeen Iraqi Shiites are discovered bound and executed.  Some were beheaded.
Two Syrian security force personnel are shot by religious extremists as they are attempting an arrest.
Seven Chechen police officers are killed when Mujahideen rebels fire a grenade launcher at their car.
Two Iraqis are killed in a Jihad attack on their vehicle.
A policeman and his brother are shot to death by Jihadis while riding in their car.
Two separate shooting attacks by Muslim militants leave two, including a Buddhist, dead.
Muslims murder a 49-year-old Buddhist construction worker on his way to work.
Ten people are slaughtered by a Sunni bomb in a Shia neighborhood, including a pregnant woman and her husband.
A bomb planted in a Shia cemetery kills two people, including an 8-year-old girl, and injures three others, all from the same family.
Jihad gunmen open fire on a bus carrying construction laborers, killing eleven in the brutal attack and injuring two.
Fifteen people are injured when a bomb believed to be planted by Chechen terrorists derails a commuter train
Three people are killed, and at least four injured in two separate suicide blasts.
The Taliban kill a woman with a landmine.  The blast injures her two children and two other women.
Four women are among eight dead in a series of bomb blasts.
Armed fundamentalists stage a shooting attack on a group of people, killing at least four.
At least thirteen people are slaughtered, and over one hundred injured when the Mujahideen set off a truck bomb near a school.  Many schoolchildren are among the casualties.
Two Buddhist twin brothers are shot by Islamic terrorists as they are riding home from school.  One dies.
Islamic radicals plant a bomb in a garbage truck, killing one of the workers and injuring several more.
Suicide bomber kills six Iraqis, including two children and injures four others.
A Fedayeen suicide bomber wades into a crowd of people shopping in a market and kills nineteen, including children, and injures about ninety others in an egregious and senseless attack.
Taliban extremists walk into a medical clinic and gun down a doctor and seven hospital workers in cold blood.
Four people are murdered in three shooting attacks by Islamic radicals.
A man is cut to pieces by Taliban bullets.
The Mujahideen assassinate a veterinarian and also set fire to another civilian's house, killing his 8-month-old daughter in the flames.
A particularly heinous suicide bombing attack on Iraqi soldiers eating lunch at their base leaves twenty-three dead and about thirty injured.
A suicide bomber detonates near a market, murdering four Iraqis and injuring twenty-nine others.
Fifteen people, including a child and two women are injured by the splinters of a grenade thrown by the Mujahideen on a road.
Three separate attacks in the same Thai province by militant Muslims leave two dead and three injured.
Ansar al-Sunna terrorists shoot an Iraqi judge to death, along with his driver.
Islamic extremists gun down a cop.
Islamic gunmen are thought responsible for an attack on a hospital, in which two patients were shot to death in their beds.
A Laotian man and wife are beheaded on the chicken farm where they work.
A policeman is murdered by Islamists.
A school guard is beaten to death by radical Muslims.
Fourteen Iraqis die when a suicide bomber detonates an explosives laden car on a street corner.
Senior Saudi official is gunned down by Islamists outside his home.
A 10-year-old girl is killed by a bomb and two bodies are found, brutally executed.
Two gay teenagers are hanged.
The Palestinian terrorist group, Abu Rish Brigade, takes credit for an ambush on a civilian labor group that leaves an Israeli guard dead.
A suicidal religious extremist walks into a restaurant and blows up twenty-three innocent people.  Another thirty-six patrons are injured.
Fedayeen suicide bomber kills three Iraqis.
Sunni terrorists open fire on shoppers at a marketplace, killing three and injuring seven.
The Taliban machine-gun a car with three people, including a judge.
The Mujahideen fire into a civilian's home, killing his 14-year-old daughter and injuring his wife.
Islamic militants invade a home and shoot three young volunteer teachers to death.
Two Harkat-ul-Mujahideen terrorists assassinate a local political figure.
Palestinian snipers kill an Israeli civilian traveling in his car.  His 13-year-old son is shot as well.
Three car bombs, at least one by a suicidal "holy warrior," kill eighteen people, mostly Kurds, and injure over one-hundred.
A civilian is killed in an ambush by Taliban gunmen.
Taliban terrorists kill the husband of an election worker.
An anti-Syria political leader is assassinated by a car bomb in Lebanon.
A bomb set off by Muslim extremists injures seven, including two monks and three elderly people.
Muslim extremists behead a 34-year-old cloth vendor.  The head is found 2km away.
Eighteen Shiite civilians are slaughtered in three separate bombing attacks by radical Sunnis.  About fifty are injured.
About seventeen people, including two teenage boys are injured when the Mujahideen toss a grenade onto a road.
The Mujahideen abduct and kill two civilians by slashing their throats.
A civilian is killed when Islamists put a bomb under his vehicle.
The Salafist Group for Preaching and Combat bombs a police convoy, killing one officer.
A senseless attack on a U.S. Marine mail convoy kills four, including three women.
Four more car bombs aimed at Shia civilians kill fifteen and injure over fifty in residential neighborhoods.
Two Sunni clerics are assassinated in an attack that leaves a boy injured.
Probable al-Qaeda ambush on a delivery truck leaves four people dead.
Eight policemen are captured at a checkpoint by Jihadis, then executed.  Two separate attacks elsewhere leave five others dead.
The Taliban murder an election candidate and two of his bodyguards.
A man and his wife stop to remove a tree branch from the road, when they are attacked by militant Muslims, who then cut off their heads.
Nine people are killed when Islamic militants detonate a powerful car bomb at a popular tourist attraction.
A man is killed by a Muslim sniper.
A female school principal is murdered by Islamic gunmen.
Two civilians, including a rubber worker, are murdered by Muslims in separate attacks.
A female schoolteacher is killed by the Mujahideen.
Suicide bomber blows himself to Allah, taking five innocents with him.
Suicide bomber slams into a residential neighborhood, killing nine civilians and injuring sixteen.
Sunni insurgents mortar bomb a crowded Shia cafe, killing five civilians and injuring seven.

A brutal shooting attack a point-blank range on a group of Israeli teenagers, hitchhiking on a roadside, leaves a 17-year-old and a 16-year-old dead.  Three others were injured.  al-Aqsa Martyrs Brigade take credit for the murder.
Four bombings by suicidal Fedayeen in disguised vehicles leave three dozen people dead and dozens more injured.
The Mujahideen abduct a civilian from his home, take him to an orchard and kill him in brutal fashion.
Islamic fundamentalists attack a barbershop, killing two, including a 9-year-old boy, then blow up the building.
The Mujahideen abduct a woman from her home, torture then murder her.
Sunni extremists murder an engineer.
A chicken vendor is murdered by Islamists.
Four people, including a child, lose their lives in a Jihad mortar attack.
A janitor and a poultry trader are murdered in separate attacks by Islamic militants on motorcycles.
Islamic militants shoot a government worker to death as he is walking along the side of the road.
Sunni terrorists kill three oil company workers with a roadside bomb.
Four civilians are killed, and dozens injured when fundamentalists detonate a car bomb outside a theater.
A suicide bomber enters a hospital then detonates his explosives, killing three other people.
An 87-year-old Iraqi politician and four others, including his son, are killed by a Fedayeen suicide bomber.
Four security personnel are killed by Muslim militants in a shootout.
Fourteen people are injured when the Mujahideen toss a grenade into a city street.
Hezbollah attacks an Israeli position from across the Lebanese border, killing one and injuring three.
Two people are murdered in separate attacks by radical Muslims.
A city councilman is killed by Muslim assassins.
A security specialist is murdered by al-Qaeda as he is leaving work.
A civilian is murdered by Islamists as he is leaving a market.
A man is attacked in his home and beaten to death by militant Muslims.
Muslim gunmen burst into an optician's shop and kill seven people in cold blood - four from the same family.
The Mujahideen kill a 20-year-old girl on the night before her wedding, along with her mother and a neighbor.  A civilian is also abducted from his home and killed in the same district.
Nine village elders are kidnapped and killed by the Taliban, along with a 10-year-old boy.
Three civilians are abducted from their homes and executed by the Mujahideen, including a 65-year-old man.
A Shiite cleric is gunned down in cold blood by Sunnis in a drive-by attack.
A farmer is gunned down my Islamic radicals.
Two Buddhist villagers are murdered by Muslim terrorists while drinking tea.
Muslims fire on a policeman and his wife, killing the man.
Russian troops and civilians are casualties in a radio-controlled bomb attack outside a bathhouse blamed on Islamic militants.
The Taliban attack a UN convoy with a roadside bomb, killing six Afghan security personnel.
A bomb hidden in a vegetable cart targets a Shia funeral procession.
Two Sunni suicide bombers kill at least six people and injured dozens more in a Shia neighborhood.
A suicidal Muslim bomber kills sixteen other people outside a police station.  About two dozen others are injured in the blast.
Pro-democracy cleric is killed by a Taliban sniper his home.
Two Syrian border patrol personnel are killed an Islamic extremist, near Lebanon.
Two Afghan policemen are kidnapped and executed by the Taliban.
A civilian is murdered by Muslim jihadists.
Two policemen are killed by an insurgent bombing.
The Mujahideen abduct then shoot a civilian to death.
Sunni insurgents kill a painting contractor, and kidnap, torture and behead another man.
A remote-controlled bomb kills two civilians, including a woman.
A youth is abducted and hanged by the Mujahideen.
Three civilians are blown to bits, and nine others badly injured by a Fedayeen suicide bombing on a busy road.
A suicide bomber on a bicycle kills a Turkish engineer and injures two others.
A prominent politician is assassinated, along with his uncle, by suspected Islamists as they sit in their car at a light.
In two separate home invasions, the Mujahideen shoot two people to death and critically injure the wife of one.
A 44-year-old security force member is abducted and beheaded by Islamists.
Islamic extremists shoot three barbers to death for shaving beards.
Islamic militants open fire on a group of policemen, killing one.
A newspaper deliveryman is murdered by Muslim radicals.
A teacher is murdered by Islamists.
Fundamentalists slit the throats of three Algerian soldiers and a civilian.
The Mujahideen kidnap a student from his classroom and subsequently shoot him to death.
Islamic fundamentalists bomb a convoy, killing one Algerian solider and injuring thirteen others.
Muslims on motorcycles shoot a 52-year-old in the neck and hand as he is riding to market.
Thirteen civilians are slaughtered in twin suicide bombings by Muslim extremists.  About thirty others are injured.
al-Qaeda Organization for Holy War pronounces "Allah's judgment" and kills a kidnapped Egyptian diplomat on video.
Ten Afghan police officers are captured by the Taliban and senselessly beheaded.
Islamic terrorists massacre more than fifty commuters on three separate subway trains and a double-decker bus on the street with four suicide bombs.  Over seven-hundred people are injured.
Five people at a market are killed when Sunni terrorists lob more than a dozen mortar rounds into the square.
Religious extremists blow up a passing vehicle, killing three civilians.
Islamists fire on utility workers trimming trees, killing one.
A man and his wife are murdered inside their home by Sunni extremists.
Four Indian soldiers are ambushed and killed by Islamic militants.
A group of thirty Islamists set-up a fake roadblock, then slaughter four Algerians that are fooled into stopping.
A Shia cleric is gunned down on a street by Pakistani Sunnis.
A family of eight Shia is gruesomely murdered by Sunni radicals as they sleep in their home.
Suicidal Sunni kills four civilians on a highway, near a hospital.  Fifteen are injured in the blast.
A al-Qaeda suicide bomber blows himself to Allah, taking twenty-five innocents with him.  Nearly fifty others are injured.
Two Islamic suicide bombers kill seven customs agents.
The Taliban murder two civilians in an incendiary attack on their vehicle.
A man is murdered in his grocery story by Islamic radicals.
Two village guards are killed in separate terror attacks.
al-Qaeda assassinates a Somali peace activist outside his home.

The terror group, Islamic Jihad, takes credit for a suicide bombing, in which a bomber kills five Jews crossing the street in front of a mall.  All of the victims were female, two were teenage girls.  About seventy others were injured.
Sunnis detonate a car bomb in an industrial district, killing three civilians and injuring fifteen more.
Four civilians are murdered in separate attacks by Muslim radicals.
Two community guards are killed in separate attacks by Islamic fundamentalists (Jijel).
Muslim terrorists target a Christian politician with a bomb, but kill a civilian instead.
A civilian is shot to death by Sunni extremists.
A suicide bomber kills two others inside a Sunni mosque.
An Islamic suicide bomber deliberately plows his car into a group of children, slaughtering at least twenty-seven.  Children were amply represented among the injured.
Three children, including two brothers, are killed by a homemade bomb.
The Mujahideen abduct a civilian, then kill him in captivity.
Islamic militants set off four bombs in restaurants and other business areas, killing at least two people.
Palestinian terrorists hit an Israeli residence with a missile, killing a woman.
A metal-shop owner is shot to death in a tea shop by Islamists.
Two civilians, including a taxi driver, are murdered by Islamic terrorists.
Seven cops are brutally slain in a surprise attack by religious extremists.
Two female teachers are gunned down by Muslims on motorcycles as they are walking home.
Seven suicide bombers take at least twenty-seven innocents with them to Allah.  About one hundred others suffer injuries; many lose limbs.
The Mujahideen shoot a man to death outside his home, and also stage a separate attack that kills a 6-year-old girl.
Muslim terrorists kill three British soldiers with a roadside bomb.

A religious extremist with explosives wrapped around his chest, detonates himself in a crowded city street, killing over seventy other people.  Nearly two-hundred others are injured in the horrific attack.
Muslim separatists attack a school, killing two security guards.
Four Fedayeen kill twenty-two people in separate suicide bombings.
Taliban extremists murder an electoral worker.
Nine villagers are slaughtered in a Taliban raid.
Five passengers aboard a bus are killed when the Mujahideen ambush it along a mountain road.  Fifteen others are injured.
A Shia schoolteacher is gunned down, and his wife critically injured.
A Sunni cleric is attacked in his car by Shia on motorcycles, who manage to kill his son.
Islamic insurgents murder six policemen and a government worker in six separate shooting attacks.
The Mujahideen shoot a man to death outside his shop.
In three separate attacks, Muslims behead a farmer and shoot at least two other people to death, including a school principal.

The Hizbul Mujahideen enter a residence and slaughter six members of a family, in a heinous attack.
Fourteen people, including civilians, are killed in a Jihad attack by Muslim separatists on a remote road.
Jihadis stage a shooting attack on a minivan carrying civilians, killing thirteen in all.
Three people are gunned down in sectarian attacks.
A suicidal Sunni murders ten people near an airport and causes egregious injuries to at least a dozen others.
Hizbul Mujahideen suicide bomber targets a missionary children's school in the Indian capital, killing at least six and injuring more than a dozen.
Two Jihad car bombings kill four and injure four, including a young girl.
Fifteen innocents are attacked and killed by Taliban extremists in a three-day spree.
Two civilians are brutally murdered in separate attacks.
A religious extremist kills himself and five innocents in a blast at a traffic checkpoint.
Two civilians are killed when the Mujahideen attack a security camp.
The Taliban ambush a vehicle carrying two people.  Both are killed in the explosion.
Militant Muslims fire on a bus stop, killing a civilian and injuring two others.
Four Jihad attacks leave twelve Iraqis dead, including a senseless ambush on a wedding party that left the bride and her mother dead.
al-Qaeda suspected in shooting deaths of a tribal leader, his two sons and brother.
Islamic terrorists kill two people in a shooting ambush.
A forest director is killed in his home by Jihad gunmen.
A Buddhist student is gunned down by Islamic extremists.
Palestinian gunmen murder an Israeli husband and wife.  They also open fire on medical rescue workers, injuring five of them.

More than eighty tourists and workers are killed when Islamic militants detonate three powerful car bombs outside a cafe and two hotels.  One suicide bomber drove into the lobby.  Over one-hundred people suffer injuries.
Islamic militants shoot a 58-year-old village leader twice in the head as he is riding with his wife.
Twelve people are injured by a car bomb placed in a Christian neighborhood.
The Taliban assassinate a judge as he is walking to work.
A horrific scene as a Fedayeen suicide bomber kills twenty-two people, mostly civilians in a crowded area near sidewalk cafes.
Muslim terrorists put a bomb beneath a passenger train that kills one and injures four commuters.
Islamists behead the son of a police officer.
A Fedayeen suicide bomber drives his car in front of a hotel and slaughters a dozen people.  Sixteen others are injured.
Muslim terrorists ambush a security patrol, killing one and injuring three.
In two separate attacks (one in Tikrit) Jihadis kill three innocents, including a child and a truck driver.
Three policemen are killed when terrorists fire a rocket at point-blank range.
Sunni gunmen massacre sixteen Shia civilians with an automatic weapons attack on their vehicles.  Over two dozen are inured with gunshot wounds.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen members invade a home and murder a civilian.
The Taliban kill a police chief and one other with a rocket attack on their car.
A Muslim separatist group, the ONLF, kills five people, including a child, in two grenade attacks against civilian targets.
Two civilians are killed in their motorcycle shop.
A school principal is murdered by Islamic radicals.
A cop is gunned down by Jihadis.
Five civilians are gunned down by Islamic radicals in separate attacks.
al-Qaeda executes two Algerian diplomats that were abducted several days earlier.
A 5-year-old girl, her mother and grandmother are slaughtered in a home invasion by the Mujahideen.
Islamic terrorists kill a man as he is buying candy for his children.
A cop is gunned down by Jihadis.
The Taliban ambush and slaughter seven people.
Two Christian charity workers are hacked to death inside their home by hardline Islamic militants, who chained the doors shut to prevent their escape or rescue.
A village leader is gunned down and three others suffer injuries in a separate attack in Narathiwat.
The Salafist Group for Preaching and Combat kill two Algerian police officers in an ambush.
A suicidal religious extremist wanders into a crowd of people and detonates explosives strapped to his body, killing over fifty people.
The Mujahideen invade a home to kill the wife of a police officer, along with his young nephew.
Muslims line up five Hindu villagers and then slit their throats.  Elsewhere in the same district, they murder a woman with an axe.
Islamists kill two policemen in an ambush.
The Mujahideen stage an attack on a hotel that claims the lives of two security personnel and injures about twenty-five others.
A Fedayeen suicide bomber kills six Iraqis near a theatre.  Twenty-six others are injured.
A district governor and his two bodyguards are assassinated by the Taliban in a roadside attack.
A bomb attack on the British Embassy convoy leaves two security guards dead and two children injured.
Police find the bodies of three airport workers, bound and tortured by the Jihadis.  Their throats were cut.
A civilian is shot to death inside his own home by militant Muslims.
Seven civilians are killed by a Jihad car bombing.
Religious extremists gun down a policeman and his young daughter.
Muslim assailants kill two people in separate attacks.
Shia gunmen kill a Sunni cleric and his brother, then gun down a vehicle carrying five mourners on their way to view the bodies.
An Islamic suicide bomber kills four civilians and injures two dozen.
The Mujahideen kill a man who is working his paddy fields.
A woman is shot to death by the Mujahideen inside her home.
The Taliban kill eight police in an attack on their checkpoint.
Palestinian terrorists fire a rocket at a group of Israeli demonstrators.  The missile hits their own group instead, killing a 3-year-old boy and injuring nine others, including five children.
Shia gunmen abduct and execute an American journalist.  They also cause severe injury to his female interpreter.
A civilian is murdered by armed Muslims.
Muslim terrorists murder a school bus driver.
A married couple is murdered in their orchard by Islamists.
Two witnesses who testified against the Islamic bombers behind a massacre of Christians at a market are themselves assassinated.
A Fedayeen suicide bomber kills four Iraqis and injures an unknown number of others.
Jihadis shoot two engineers to death for working at a U.S. base.
al-Qaeda militants kill five Pakistani soldiers with a landmine.
The Taliban kill an election worker in an attack from a motorcycle.
Jihadis open fire on a line of cars at a gas station, killing one civilian.
The bodies of four civilians surface in Mosul with signs of torture.
Muslim fanatics invade the home of an Iraqi soldier and kill his wife, 12-year-old daughter and 6-year-old son in their beds.
al-Qaeda suspected in the attack on a highway police checkpoint that leaves an officer dead.
The Mujahideen throw a grenade at a hostel, killing a pregnant woman.
The Taliban murder a civilian and kidnap two others.
A man is murdered by Muslim terrorists as he leaves a tea shop.
A man is shot to death by Muslims at a tea shop.
In six separate attacks, Jihadi gunmen kill ten Iraqis.
Suicide bomber blows himself to Allah, taking two Iraqis with him.  Ten others are injured.
The Mujahideen invade two residences, killing one civilian and severely injuring another.
Seven civilians, including three children are murdered when Islamic terrorists bomb a minibus.
Militant Muslims spray a car with automatic weapons fire, killing the parent of a young child, who was also severely injured in the attack.
The Taliban murder a doctor, on the grounds that he was planning to run for public office.  Another villager is killed as well.
Three young girls are killed by a Mujahideen bomb.
Two civilians are killed in a bomb blast outside a shop.
A tractor mechanic is murdered by Muslim terrorists.
A cop is gunned down by Sunni terrorists.
A policeman is murdered in an attack by Islamic terrorists.
Two civilians, including a school janitor, are murdered separately by Islamic terrorists.
A civilian is murdered by Islamists.
A Catholic layman is abducted and strangled to death by Islamic fundamentalists.
In a senseless attack, terrorists use a roadside bomb and small arms fire to kill four Americans trying to clear landmines.
A shepherd is beaten to death by the Mujahideen.
At least six separate Jihad attacks, mostly on civilians, leave over twenty Iraqis dead and more than twice as many injured.
A suicidal Sunni detonates a car bomb near a group of police, killing at least six, including four civilians.  Fourteen suffer injury.
Two oil pipeline security guards are shot to death by Islamic terrorists.
Jihadis kill a 12-year-old girl's mother and pharmacist father in an attack that also leaves her injured.
The Taliban drag a poor, illiterate woman from her house and shoot her to death.
Abu Sayyaf behind two bombs that injure twenty-six near a parked van and at a restaurant.
al-Qaeda targets and kills four civilians with a landmine.
The Mujahideen abduct and later kill a police officer.
Muslim extremists kill two Shia civilians in separate motorcycle attacks.
A school guard is murdered by Muslim terrorists on his way to work.
A rubber plantation owner is murdered by Islamists.
Two civilians are beheaded by Islamic extremists.
Islamic radicals kidnap, torture and kill a Catholic layman.
Muslim extremists kill three community guards and injure four others.
An employee of an irrigation works project is abducted and killed by the Mujahideen.
Three children are among four civilians killed by a bomb planted by radical Muslims near a mosque.
The Hizb-ul-Mujahideen attack a village and shoot two teenage boys to death.
A bomb explodes at a women's market, killing a young child.
Muslim militants attack a Hindu village in the middle of the night, killing five people in their homes, including three Hindu teenagers, and injuring at least nine others.
A man and his 13-year-old son are critically wounded by Muslim gunmen.
Two civilians are shot to death by Islamists.
Various sectarian attacks leave eighteen dead.

In three separate attacks, Muslim gunmen shoot two Buddhist men at point-blank range as they are drinking tea.  They also shoot a 40-year-old woman by the side of the road and hack another woman with a machete while she is working her garden.
Four investigators are killed by Islamic terrorists on their way to probe another murder that took place earlier in the day.
Five family members lose their lives in an 'honor killing.'
An Islamic suicide bomber kills two civilians and injures five others.
Muslims target a restaurant with a car bomb, killing a woman and a 12-year-old boy.
The mass grave of thirty people, including two women, is uncovered.  The Fedayeen tortured the victims before executing them.
'Holy Warriors' kidnap a Christian woman and then cut off her head.
An Indian guard is killed, and nine other people are injured by a Mujahideen car bombing in a residential area.
Six Iraqi recruits are pulled from a bus by Sunni radicals and shot to death execution-style.
One person is killed, and eleven others injured by a Taliban bus bomb.
The Jumatul Mujahedin take credit for hundreds of synchronized blasts that kill two, including a 40-year-old rickshaw puller.  Over one-hundred others are injured.

Jihadis murder over forty people in three separate car bombings that also leave about one-hundred injured.  Most of the victims were simply waiting at a bus stop or seeking medical treatment at a hospital when they were targeted.
Three civilians are killed when Islamic fundamentalists attack their village.
A police officer is abducted and brutally slain by the Mujahideen.
Jihadis murder a judge and his driver.
A teacher and a policeman are shot dead by Muslim militants in separate attacks.
In four separate attacks, the Mujahideen kill four civilians, including a 75-year-old man and a 16-year-old boy.
Jihadi gunmen abduct three Sunni political workers that were hanging posters urging people to vote.  They are later made to stand against a wall, where they are executed.
A Jordanian soldier is killed by an al-Qaeda rocket attack at a seaport.
In a gruesome attack, Islamic fundamentalists knife six hikers to death, including a woman.
A man is gunned down in cold blood by the Mujahideen.
Islamic Jamaat claims responsibility for a bombing that killed three policemen walking past a grove of trees.
A 48-year-old passerby is killed by Islamic militants in a remote-controlled bombing.
Jaish-e-Mohammed terrorists kidnap and kill a civilian.
The Taliban kill four members of a medical rescue team.
A terrorist bomb kills four Iraqis and injures five.
Islamic separatists kill eight people, mostly civilians, in five separate attacks across the southern Thai provinces using bombs and bullets.
Sunni extremists kill two scholars.
Muslims place a bomb near a gas pipeline.  Two civilians are killed in the explosion.
A power company employee is murdered by Islamic radicals.
In four separate attacks across the country radical Sunnis kill eight, including a married couple in their car, the owner of a food shop and his son, and two truck drivers.
Jihad gunmen spray a police van with bullets, killing eight and injuring three.  Casualties include civilians.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen kill three family members inside their home.  Two other civilians are abducted and killed in separate incidents in Kashmir.
Two children are killed in a bombing by Islamic terrorists.  Six others are injured.
An al-Qaeda suicide bomber on foot slaughters seven people and injures about twenty others.
A tour operator is murdered by Islamists.
Muslim gunmen kill a man in his pickup truck.
A man is shot to death by Muslim terrorists while drinking tea with friends.
A teacher and a school guard are shot to death by Muslim radicals.
In at least four separate attacks, nine people are killed by Jihadis and over thirty injured.
Seven people are injured when an Islamic militant throws a grenade into the street.
A Palestinian stabs two young ultra-orthodox Jews on the street, killing one of them and leaving the other badly injured.
The bodies of thirty-six men in civilian clothes are found dumped in a remote area.  They were handcuffed and executed.
Six civilians, mostly elderly men, are murdered in a cafe by militant Muslim gunmen, who enter at breakfast to gun down the victims.
A bomb set by Muslim radicals in a Christian sector of town injures seven people.
A man and his son are shot to death by the Mujahideen, while another family is injured in the attack.
Islamic extremists attack a police patrol with an IED, killing two members.
A map-maker and a merchant are slaughtered by Taliban extremists.
A cattle farmer is murdered by Islamists.
Muslim militants murder a man on his way home.
Muslims shoot and kill a Buddhist man and also shoot his paralyzed father as the two were watching TV.
An assassination attempt by Islamic militants injures a prime minister and kills his bodyguard.
Several separate attacks across Kashmir by Muslim terrorists leave four civilians dead and more than a dozen people injured.
Two Egyptians are killed in the Sinai, when Islamic radicals detonate a landmine under their car.
A political candidate is murdered by the Taliban.
Two Christians are killed and two wounded when Muslim gunmen attack their car.
Three members of a Sunni political party are kidnapped and later killed in front of a mosque by men calling them "non-Muslims."
Islamic militants kill two Pakistani soldiers with a bomb.
A Christian is gunned down by Muslim militants.
A defense volunteer is killed by Muslim gunmen.
An art teacher is murdered by Islamic fundamentalists.
A former religious teacher is killed by Islamists.
Two Serbian men are shot and killed in a terror attack.
Eight Israelis are hospitalized by a Fatah suicide bomber, including two guards that were seriously wounded.
Thirty people are injured and two people, including a child, are killed when Abu Sayyaf militants, disguised as fishermen, bomb a ferry.

Islamic insurgents "fight for freedom" by killing a child with a missile that also injures seven other children, who are then treated by U.S. soldiers.  Elsewhere the bodies of a beheaded civilian and a policeman are found.
A guard protecting Buddhist monks is shot to death by Muslim radicals.
A cleric is gunned down by terrorists.
A former official is killed in front of a school full of children by Muslim gunmen.
A Buddhist construction worker is murdered by Islamists.
A campaign worker is shot to death by the Mujahideen.
Islamic radicals spray a police checkpoint with bullets, killing an officer and severely injuring his wife.
Fifteen people are injured by six bombs set by Muslim militants outside a hotel.
Muslim radical detonates a bomb on a city street, killing a passerby and injuring three others.
Two police officers are killed in a shootout with Islamic militants planning a major terror attack in Chechnya.
Sunni radicals stage three separate attacks on Shia pilgrims, killing seven and injuring about three dozen.
A cleric is beheaded by the Taliban for participating in an election.
The Taliban gun down three security officers in cold blood and kidnap a British engineer and his interpreter.
A rubber plantation worker is gunned down, and his wife injured by Muslim terrorists.
A moderate cleric is gunned down by Muslim extremists.
A bus driver is shot to death by Islamists while dropping kids off at school.
Militant Muslims gun down a hospital worker.
A religious teacher is killed by terrorists on his way to school.
The mayor of a small town is shot and killed by Islamic fundamentalists at a fake roadblock.
Muslims kill a 45-year-old Buddhist man as he is traveling home with his daughter.
al-Qaeda militants kill a village elder.
Lashkar-e-Toiba terrorists attack a group of civilians, killing three and injuring four.  The casualties include two women.
Five people, including a 7-year-old child, are killed and eleven wounded in a Jihad bombing attack.
Five Iraqi soldiers are killed in a terrorist bombing while on patrol.  Nine are injured.
A rubber tapper is murdered by Islamists.
Five people are murdered in a shooting spree by Taliban terrorists.
A civilian is murdered by Islamic radicals while on his way to pick herbs.
Militant Muslims gun down a cattle farmer.
Muslim separatists shoot a civilian in his car, then burn him alive.
Muslim terrorists spray a grocery store with machine-gun fire, killing a Buddhist patron.
Taliban extremists murder a police officer at a checkpoint.
Jihadis murder sixteen Iraqi security force personnel in three separate attacks.
Shia gunmen fire on Sunni worshippers at a mosque, killing one.
Islamic militants fire several mortars into a residential area, killing three civilians and injuring eleven.
al-Qaeda takes over a small town and executes at least ten people, including a woman accused of being a prostitute.
The Taliban execute a British hostage and also ambush a police patrol, killing four officers.
Abu Sayyaf terrorists kill three unarmed, off-duty Filipino soldiers.
The Mujahideen shoot a retired schoolteacher to death.  Elsewhere (Poshana) another civilian is abducted and killed in captivity.
A man is murdered by Muslim gunmen in front of his home.
A Buddhist worker delivering wood is brutally slain by Muslim terrorists.
Muslims intrude into a villager's home and kill him.
Islamic radicals bomb a convoy of teachers, killing a guard.
Sixteen civilians are injured when a Muslim terrorist hurls a grenade into the road.
A civilian is abducted and killed by Islamic militants.
An elderly woman is abducted and beheaded by the Mujahideen.
Militant Muslims shoot a young woman to death approximately two months after her husband is killed.
Three brothers are shot to death by the Hizb-ul-Mujahideen.
Eleven Iraqis, mostly civilian, are killed by a 'Holy Warrior' suicide bomber on a city street.
Four people, including a woman, are killed and twenty-seven injured when a Hamas weapons lab blows up in a residential neighborhood.
Suicide bomber kills two Iraqis.
Islamic militants suspected in a shooting attack on a police vehicle that leaves three Russian officers dead.
Two civilians are gunned down by the Hizb-ul-Mujahideen in separate attacks.
An elderly civilian is killed in a bombing by Muslim radicals.
A Russian soldier is killed in an Islamic terror bombing.
A suicide car bombing goes badly, killing three bombers but only one passerby.
The Taliban kill four policemen guarding a road maintenance crew.
Muslim terrorists car bomb a take-out restaurant, killing sixteen civilians in and around the building.  Twenty-one are injured.
Four American civilians are killed by Muslim terrorists in a roadside bombing.
One civilian is killed and thirteen others injured when Muslim militants toss a grenade into a bus stop.
Two civilians are abducted and killed in separate attacks by the Mujahideen.
Two civilians are killed in attacks by rival Islamic groups.
Two ordinary civilians are gunned down for no apparent reason by Muslim terrorists in separate attacks.
A Buddhist truck driver delivering rice is murdered by radical Islamic gunmen.
Four police officer are brutally murdered in their vehicle in a Taliban bombing.
A woman is murdered by Muslims while on her way to see children at a hospital.
The Mujahideen kill a Hindu as he is grazing his cattle.
Two shepherds are abducted from their field by the Mujahideen and then killed in captivity.
Six members of three families are massacred by Muslim militants, who level continuous fire into their village.  Two women are among the dead.
Taliban extremists kill the bodyguard of an election candidate.
Muslims slash a 62-year-old Buddhist man to death while he was on his way to work.
Vicious ambush on an Indian convoy by Lashkar-e-Toiba terrorists leaves five security force personnel dead and seven injured.
The Mujahideen shoot a father and son to death.
Muslim radicals nearly behead a teenage boy with a knife.
Islamic terrorists kill a cattle salesman.
A Buddhist construction worker is shot to death by militant Muslims.
A civilian is shot off the back of a motorcycle by terrorists.
A civilian is abducted and murdered by the Mujahideen.
Three citizens are abducted by al-Qaeda terrorists and then have their throats slit after being tortured.
Two Buddhist school bus drivers are ambushed by Muslim terrorists.  At least one dies from gunshot wounds.
Jihadis car bomb a restaurant, killing two people and injuring seventeen more.  Most of the victims were women.
A Mujahideen remote control bomb kills one and injures five.
Islamic extremists suspected in deadly attack on a high school teacher.
A 21-year-old Christian woman is assaulted by Muslim radicals for wearing jeans.  She is beaten and stabbed to death.
A teacher is murdered by Islamic radicals.
Coordinated attack by Muslim terrorists leaves a Russian policeman dead.
Three Algerian troops are killed in an ambush by the Salafi Group for Preaching and Combat.
An election official is captured and hanged by the Taliban.
The Taliban shoot seven civilians to death after finding election materials in their car.
The Mujahideen invade a woman's home, take her food, then shoot her to death and seriously injure her three children.

'Holy Warrior' suicide bombers stage twelve separate attacks against Shia civilians (mostly day laborers looking for work).  About one-hundred and thirty-five are slaughtered, with over three-hundred others injured.
Sunni gunmen invade Shia homes in the middle of the night, pulling seventeen men out and murdering them execution style.
Sunnis murder a Shia civilian.
Islamic militants open fire on a group of Russian soldiers from a house, killing five.
Taliban extremists kill three civilians traveling in a car.  Four others, including a child, are badly injured.
A merchant is murdered by Islamists.
Islamic terrorists attack a police checkpoint.
A terrorist bomb explodes in a Shia mosque, killing the Imam and injuring three others.
Muslim terrorists shoot a former school teacher to death in front of his wife, who narrowly escapes with her life.
A 40-year-old man is killed by Muslim extremists on his way to work at a rubber plantation.
Three Shia pilgrims on their way to a shrine are gunned down by Sunni radicals.
Three Fedayeen suicide bombers kill at least twenty Iraqis and injure more than thirty more in a commercial district.  Three bodies are found elsewhere.
An Afghan interpreter is killed by the Taliban in a roadside attack.
The Mujahideen guns down two civilians in cold blood at their village.
A candidate for election is pulled from his house and executed by religious extremists.
Five Jihad attacks leave about a dozen Iraqis dead and over twenty injured.
A suicidal Sunni kills himself and ten others outside a Shia mosque with a car bomb.  Almost two dozen others are injured.
Muslim terrorists attack a police car on the city streets, killing an officer and a civilian.
A bomb placed in a Christian neighborhood kills one man and injures twenty-two other people.
A Buddhist construction worker is murdered by Muslim radicals.
Fundamentalists attack a security patrol, killing two members.
A guard at a natural gas facility is murdered by terrorists.
A civilian is abducted from his village and beheaded by the Mujahideen.
Sunni radicals kidnap and torture nine men before killing them execution style.
al-Qaeda murders thirty Shiites in a street bombing in an industrial area.  About forty others are injured in the blast.
A Jihad ambush on an Iraqi Parliament member leaves him and two civilians dead.
Two security officers are killed by the Taliban in an ambush.
al-Qaeda shoots a 50-year-old schoolteacher to death.
Four Iraqi security force personnel are killed by a roadside bomb planted by Jihadis.
Sunnis open fire on a group of Shia civilians, killing at least one.
Mujahideen kill a Russian soldier in a terror attack.
Two civilians are killed in their homes by the Mujahideen.
A villager has his throat slit by the Mujahideen.
Islamic fundamentalists kill two civilians and two Algerian soldiers in a remote area.
Islamic extremists kidnap, torture, and kill a reporter for the New York Times.
Two suicide bombers strike Shia pilgrims as they are walking on foot to a shrine.  Ten are killed and at least a dozen injured.
A transsexual is beaten and burned to death by Islamic extremists.
Abu Sayyaf gunmen murder a security member.
Four American contractors are murdered by Muslim radicals after their car takes a wrong turn.
Militant Muslims stage a shooting attack on a tea shop, killing two men.
al-Qaeda kills a tribal leader and a soldier in separate remote-controlled bomb attacks.
A suicidal extremist kills an American diplomat and three civilian contractors in a car bombing.
Three civilians are shot to death after the Mujahideen invade their homes.
Shouting 'Allah Akbar,' masked terrorists attack a group of border policemen checking passports, killing three.
An ambush by Jihadis on a police convoy leaves one officer dead.
Two civilians are killed in a roadside terror bombing by the Taliban.
Three policemen are killed by the Taliban while traveling home.
Two Thai marines are captured by Muslim villagers when their car breaks down.  The people later stab and beat the two Buddhists to death after holding them hostage for 18 hours.
Seven musicians are slaughtered by the Taliban as they are traveling home from a wedding.
A man is killed, and his Buddhist wife injured, by Muslim gunmen.
A school janitor is killed, and a female factory worker injured, in a shooting attack by religious extremists.
A cop is gunned down by Jihadis.
A Buddhist vegetable vendor is murdered by Islamic extremists.
A Buddhist care-taker of elephants is murdered by Islamists.
In the second such attack in as many days, Muslims fire on a married couple, killing the husband.
Two separate bomb blasts in commercial areas by Muslim terrorists kill six, including a woman, and injure thirty.
Jihadis kill nine people in four attacks, including the owner of a tile-making factory, who is killed in his home along with his two sons and daughter-in-law.
The Salafist Group for Preaching and Combat stages a terrorist attack against an Algerian army patrol, killing at least eight.
Two family members are abducted from their home by the Mujahideen.  The father is released after his son is executed.
Pakistani man guns down his 19-year-old sister and injures her husband in a public honor killing in Denmark.
A suicide bomber succeeds in killing a small child.  Four others are wounded.
A Hamas truck, loaded with rockets intended for Israel, explodes early, killing seventeen Palestinians (including three children) and injuring another one-hundred and forty.
Suicide bomber targets a civilian passenger bus and kills six people and injures at least a dozen.
Two policemen are killed by a mobile-phone bomb triggered by Islamists.
In separate attacks, a construction worker and a public health employee are gunned down by Muslim terrorists.
Militant Muslims shoot a migrant worker to death.
Militant Muslims kill a female police officer in her home.
Sunni terrorists open fire on a bus, killing two Shias, including a 15-year-old girl.
Four Assyrian Christians are killed in a Muslim bomb attack on a Christian minister.
Six musicians are shot to death by religious fundamentalists opposed to music.
Three Mujahideen terror attacks leave six Russian servicemen dead and eleven wounded.
The mother-in-law of a police officer is killed inside her home by Islamic militants.
Islamic fundamentalists set up a fake roadblock to stop a civilian car and cut the throats of two occupants.  Family members are abducted.
Two more victims of the 9/22 blast die from injuries, including a 7-year-old girl.
A government lecturer is shot to death by the Mujahideen.
A bomb planted on a bicycle kills a passerby outside a music store.  Elsewhere, four bodies are found bound and murdered.
A Fedayeen suicide bomber on a motorcycle kills six civilians and injures about twenty others.
A horrific scene of twisted metal, charred bodies and blood, as a 'Holy Warrior' kills himself in a bombing attack that also takes the lives of nine others.
A 54-year-old man is killed by Muslim terrorists while sitting in a tea shop.
Taliban landmine kills all four people in a passenger car.
A suicide bomber blows himself to Allah in an attack against a bus carrying oil ministry staff workers, taking six innocents with him and leaving fourteen others critically injured.
The body of an Israeli factory worker is found after he is kidnapped, tortured and killed by Hamas.
In a senseless attack, nine Sunni gunmen walk into an elementary school and drag five Shia teachers and their driver out of their classrooms, put them up against a wall and execute them.
Thirty-eight innocent people are murdered in a Janjaweed raid.
Three civilians are killed when Islamic fundamentalists blow a vehicle apart with an IED.
Islamic radicals gun down a school teacher.
A Lashkar-e-Toiba terrorist uses a teenage girl as a human shield in a gun battle.  Both are killed.
A suicide bomber kills himself and nine innocents in the process of applying for government jobs.  Twenty-one others are injured.
The bodies of twenty-two victims of Islamic terror are found bound and executed outside a small town.
A civilian is killed in his home by Islamic militants and another (in Thom Gali) is abducted and executed.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen terrorists invade a home and take a family of four hostage during a shoot-out with police.  A mother and daughter are killed.
A female suicide bomber detonates a bomb packed with metal ball bearings in a crowd waiting outside a recruitment center.  Six are killed and many hurt.
Nine Afghans are killed outside a military training center by a suicide bomber on a motorbike.  Twenty-eight others are injured in the blast.
Thirty-four refugees are massacred by Arab militia on horseback at a camp.  Women and children are amply represented among the dead.
A fruit vendor is shot to death by Muslims, in an attack that also injures his 8-year-old daughter.
A 43-year-old Christian is shot to death.

About one-hundred people are massacred in three separate suicide attacks by Sunni fanatics.  Most were at a vegetable market or near a bank.  The third was near a clothing shop.  Many more are injured, most with burns - some with missing limbs.
al-Qaeda terrorists stage an attack on a vehicle carrying government officials, killing five.
A civilian has his throat slit by al-Qaeda militants.
Islamic militants abduct a civilian and beat him to death.
Fifteen civilians and four security personnel are injured when a Muslim militant hurls a grenade into a crowd.
Mujahideen gunmen open up on a car, killing two police officers and a 3-year-old girl.  The girl's mother suffered injury.
In two attacks, Sunni gunmen machine-gun workers at a Shia bakery as well as a van carrying soccer-stadium employees.  Four people are murdered.
The Mujahideen invade a home and kill a young girl.  Another civilian is killed elsewhere (Kulgam).
Two Chinese street vendors are killed in a drive-by shooting by Islamists on motorcycles.
Terrorists ambush a police patrol, killing one and injuring five.
Nine Shia civilians are blown to bits by a morning car bomb at a vegetable market.  Nearly fifty others are injured.
Janjaweed militia attack a camp for displaced persons, killing about thirty innocents.
A transgender man is murdered by Islamic extremists earlier in the month.
A Buddhist student is murdered by Islamists as he is riding home.
Two people are abducted and brutally murdered by the Mujahideen.
Jihad rebels blow apart a troop transport, killing one soldier and injuring two others.
Islamic suicide bombers murder nineteen people, mostly tourists, at two cafes and a restaurant in three coordinated attacks.  Over one-hundred are injured.
Militants hurl homemade bombs at a group of civilians in a fish market, killing two and injuring three.
al-Qaeda militants kill three Pakistani security personnel in a rocket attack.
A civilian is murdered by a Harkat-ul-Jehad-i-Islami terrorist.
The son of a pro-government tribal leader is gunned down by al-Qaeda militants.
Two bomb squad inspectors are killed in a remote-controlled explosion courtesy of Islamic terrorists.
A 53-year-old Christian is shot to death.
Members of Jamaat-ul-Mujahideen stage a series of bombing attacks that kill at least two people and injure forty.
An attempted assassination of an oil minister leaves his two bodyguards dead.  A Jihad attack from the day before killed the director of public works.
Terrorists abduct a civilian and murder him in captivity.
Ramadan in Iraq begins with a suicide car bombing inside the Green Zone that kills three people.
The Mujahideen kill two counter-insurgents in an attack and also abduct and kill a civilian in Kulgam.
Six Afghans are killed by a Taliban bomb at a border crossing.  Sixteen others are injured.
At least three dozen Shiites are killed and nearly one-hundred others injured by a suicide bomber at a mosque during a funeral service.
A 'Holy Warrior for Allah' manages to kill a 10-year-old boy in a suicide bombing.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen cadres enter a residence and kill a man along with his 21-year-old daughter and 16-year-old son.  Another son had been killed last year.
A civilian is abducted and beheaded by Muslim terrorists.
Islamic militants shoot five Thai soldiers to death as they are eating dinner at a remote outpost.
al-Qaeda militants fire a rocket into a house, killing a man and his young son and daughter.
Ten Iraqis riding a bus are blown to bits by a Fedayeen suicide bomber.  Eight others are badly injured.
Two bombs are set off by Muslim terrorists at a restaurant, killing one and injuring ten.
Suicide bomber blows himself to Allah, taking two innocent women with him.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen terrorists detonate a bomb under a bank truck, killing the driver.
Two people are taken from their homes and murdered by the Mujahideen.
Two civilians are killed in a car bombing.
A policeman is murdered in his home by Jihadis.
Jihadi car bomb kills three civilians.
Radicals kill the driver of a police chief.
A small girl is among two killed by a Mujahideen grenade blast in a terror attack.
Sectarian attack on a crowd of people by gunmen at a mosque for a minority Islamic group leaves eight dead and nineteen injured.
A civilian is killed inside his home by the Mujahideen.
Fedayeen suicide bomber murders seven people on a city street.  Sixteen others are injured in the blast.
A rubber tapper is gunned down by Islamic extremists.
A Buddhist husband and wife are murdered on their way home by Islamic gunmen.
A woman having dinner with her son is shot to death by Muslim radicals.
Two policemen are slain in a brutal assault by Islamic terrorists.
Members of the Salafist Group for Preaching and Combat storm a coffee house, where they slit the throats of two patrons.
Suicide bombings and other Sunni attacks across the country (and an incident in which a Shiite teacher was dragged out of his classroom and shot to death) leave thirteen Iraqis dead.
A Taliban rocket attack leaves one person dead and five injured.
al-Qaeda militants kill three Pakistani soldiers in a landmine blast.
A suicide bomber kills a woman and a child outside an apartment building.
A young woman is killed inside her home by Muslim terrorists.  The same group also invades a second residence, killing a teenager.
The Taliban ambush a police convoy in a remote area and slaughter eighteen officers.
In two gruesome attacks, Hizb-ul-Mujahideen members swoop into two residences and slit the throats of ten Hindu family members.  Only one child is known to have survived.
Three people are killed when a Taliban suicide bomber detonates his explosives along a city street.
A firefighter and a civilian are blown apart by a Muslim IED.
Muslims kill a security volunteer.
Four people are killed by a suicide bomber at a gas station.
A Fedayeen suicide bomber drives an explosives-laden car disguised as a taxi into a crowd of shoppers at a market, killing thirty and injuring forty-five.
Sectarian attack leaves a civilian dead.
Militant Muslims ambush a group of civilians, shooting one of them to death.
A nun and one other person are stabbed in front of their church by a Muslim demonstrator.
Suicide blast sponsored by Islamic terror groups kills one and injures another.
A second al-Qaeda suicide bombing in as many days leaves another thirty Iraqis dead and at least thirty-five others in various stages of physical suffering.
Six policemen die in a Taliban ambush.
Taliban extremists murder five medical workers returning from a relief trip.  The dead include two doctors, two nurses and a driver.
Abu Sayyaf militants attack a security patrol, killing a civilian and two soldiers.
A fruit trader is murdered by Islamists.
A coordinated urban attack by 150 Islamic militants on a school and airport leaves at least forty-four civilians and law enforcement personnel dead.
Twelve people, including three women, are killed in sectarian violence following a Shia demonstration.
An elderly man is killed in his home by the Mujahideen in an attack that also injures his wife.  Another civilian is gunned down in Sambora.
Two policemen are killed in an ambush by religious extremists.
Militant Muslims capture and behead a 68-year-old Buddhist cattle farmer.
A 43-year-old electrician is gunned down by Islamists on a motorcycle while on his way to work.
Religious extremists kill a cleric and injure sixteen others with a bombing at a mosque.
Islamic militants attack a group of soldiers as they are performing physical exercises on their base.
Five U.S. Marines are killed by a terrorist bomb while responding to a mortar attack on a polling station.
Three Thai civilians are killed in three separate attacks across the southern provinces.
A civilian is murdered by an Islamic terrorist.
At least six people are killed by a mysterious bomb planted at a shopping center.  More than eighty bystanders are injured.
Two policemen guarding a railway station are gunned down by Islamists.
Militant Muslims attack a Buddhist temple, slit the throat of a 76-year-old monk and brutally kill two teenage boys.  The bodies are subsequently burned.

Three Israeli civilians, two young women and a 14-year-old boy, are gunned down in cold blood while waiting by the side of the road.  Five others are injured.  al-Aksa claims credit for the child killings.
The Taliban assassinate a religious cleric and later open fire on a group of security personnel in a separate attack.
Religious fundamentalists in eastern Algerian storm a house and slit the throats of two of the occupants.  Three other family members are kidnapped.
Two people attending a funeral are killed by a Fedayeen suicide bomber, who wanders in amidst the mourners.
al-Qaeda releases a video of a man with his hands tied behind his back being shot twice in the back of the head.
Two men are gunned down by Muslim militants in separate attacks.
A school janitor is shot to death by the Taliban.
A Hindu priest is kidnapped and murdered by Islamic extremists.
A villager is murdered by Muslim militants while standing in his yard.
Five security guards and a civilian are killed when Islamic fundamentalists open fire at a checkpoint.
Lashker-e-Toiba terrorists barge into the home of a government minister in a suicide attack that leaves him, a security guard and two civilians dead.
Islamic militants kill a policeman and injure two others in a shootout.
A Jihad attack on a police checkpoint leaves four Iraqis dead.  Three civilians are gunned down in a residential neighborhood elsewhere in the city.
Three election workers are killed by Jihadis while driving home after counting ballots.
al-Qaeda militants abduct and kill a pro-government tribal chief.
Islamic militants kill a 28-year-old woman riding on the back of a motorcycle.
Sunni gunmen barge into a factory, identify six Shia workers, then line the men up against a wall and kill them in front of their co-workers.
An anti-Taliban government official is gunned down while praying in a mosque.
The headmaster of a school is executed in front of his students.  A guard at a different school is also killed and his body is dumped in a stream.
Two civilians are killed in a Mujahideen attack that also leaves ten others injured.
Islamists fire at a group of civilians fishing, killing three.
A Fedayeen suicide car bomber kills four civilians and causes injury to at least fourteen others.
A shepherd is killed by the Mujahideen as he is grazing in the field.
A man is abducted from his home by militant Muslims and killed in captivity.
A 60-year-old man is shot to death in front of a school in a motorcycle attack.  Muslims also kill another civilian in Yala.
A small girl is among three people killed when Jihadis fire a rocket at a school.  Five other children are injured.
Religious extremists kill a humanitarian worker.
The Taliban kill an Afghan journalist with a remote-controlled bomb.
Nine policemen are killed in a Taliban ambush on their patrol.
A political activist is killed inside his residence by the Mujahideen.
Fourteen people are injured, and one civilian killed, when an Islamic militant hurls a grenade at a crowd outside a hotel.
The Taliban kill a police chief and at least one other person with a remote-controlled bomb outside a mosque.
Fatah gunmen kill a government contractor.
In a brutal attack, Muslims force a Buddhist man into a burning car.
Pakistanis stab a 24-year-old Christian man senselessly to death in what is either a racial or religious attack.
Islamic terrorists open fire on a group of security personnel, killing three.
Three Iraqis are shot to death by Sunni insurgents while driving a water truck.
Two civilians are killed by a suicide bomber.  Thirteen others are injured.
A suicide bomber kills two civilians and two police officers.
Jihadis murder two young boys riding in a car, as well as two girls, ages 7 and 9, who were standing by the car when the remote-controlled device was detonated.
Jamaat-ul-Mujahideen suspected of bombing that kills a party leader.
A terrorist shoots at a group of three men at a bazaar, killing one.
Jaish-e-Mohammed members attack and kill two policemen at a market.
A man is killed inside his home after failing to heed the warning posters at a local mosque.
al-Qaeda militants kill the driver of a military truck with a remote-controlled bomb.
Two workers for a British agency working to clear landmines are killed in a bomb attack by religious extremists.

Three separate incidents include the discovery of eight bound and executed victims, a suicide car bomb that kills two civilians, and a shooting ambush that kills three municipal workers and a passerby.
Terrorists execute twelve people working at a construction site.  Five of the victims were brothers.
Twenty passersby are massacred by three coordinated suicide attacks against a hotel.  The bombs were packed with ball-bearings to maximize human suffering.
Muslim gunmen shoot a villager to death and injure three more.
A 'scholar of Islam' stabs his apostate brother to death over heresy.
